div.p: We are pleased to announce/inform you that High Island ISD has qualified under the CEP (Community Eligibilility Provision) to provide free breakfast and lunch for ALL High Island students for the next 4 years!
High Island Elementary teachers are collecting Box Tops For Education. Please cut Box Tops from participating products and send to your child's teacher. Each Box Top is worth 10Â¢ for your school.

div.class: custom_29984 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

span.strong: Congratulations to High Island High School!Â US News and World Report recognized the Cardinals as one of the best high schools, not just in Texas, but in the NATION.
More than 17,000 schools across the nation were ranked on six factors based on their performance on state assessments and how well they prepare students for college.

span.span: Please check for COVID-19 information in the â€œCommunity Tabâ€ above.

span.strong: To all High Island ISD Parents/Guardians and Staff:Â

High Island ISD takes the safety of our students, parents/guardians, and staff as our number one priority.Â Due to the COVID-19, or Coronavirus, High Island ISD will be conducting classes March 16-20 as distance learning classes.Â There will be NO on-site classes, activities, or practices in a proactive effort to keep students, staff, parents, and the community healthy. Â

Each Friday we will reassess the situation to determine how long this method of instruction will continue.Â Every effort will be made to resume normal classes as soon as possible.Â Thank you for your cooperation and support.Â Together we will all get through this!

strong.span: Due to safety concerns about the Covid-19 virus, and the mandate just ordered by Governor Greg Abbott, High Island ISD will continue distance learning through at least May 4th.Â Â

Also, due to the ever changing procedures that we abide by,Â High Island ISD will go back to preparing meals for 5 days a week.Â Pick-up times and deliveries will take place at the same time on Monday.Â Â

span.span: Please check Red Cardinal and Highislandisd.com frequently for updates.

If you need to contact the school for any reason, you can send a private message through Red Cardinal or go to our website, highislandisd.com, and look under the district directory for the individual you would like to contact.
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â

strong.span: Regular School Board Meeting: Monday, April 27, 2020, at 6:30 pm

School Board Meetings are held in theÂ Multi-Purpose Building of the High Island Independent School District at
2113 6th Street, High Island, Texas.

p.span: High Island ISD will be participating in the following Federal Programs during the 2017-2018 school year:
Title I, Part A â€“ Improving Basic Programs
Title II, Part A â€“ Teacher & Principal Training
Title I, Part C â€“ Carl D. Perkins CTE Grant
Idea B Formula & Preschool â€“ Individuals With Disabilities Act

strong.span: The census starts in March and ends in July and determines the billions of dollars we receive in funding from the federal government.
It is extremelyÂ important that everyone in Texas is counted.

br.b: Video: How to Complete the Census English & SpanishÂ

span.span: The 2019Â â€“ 2020Â School Calendar has been approved!
High Island High School is participating in the Texas High School Coastal Monitoring Program on the Bolivar Peninsula. Â

Flood Warning

div.p: ...The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston has issued a flood warning for the following rivers... Trinity River near Moss Bluff affecting the following counties in Texas... Chambers...Liberty For Trinity River at Moss Bluff, Minor flooding is forecasted. The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston has issued a * Flood Warning for The Trinity River near Moss Bluff. * from this evening to Sunday evening or until the warning is canceled. * At 0830 AM Wednesday the stage was 12.1 feet. * Minor flooding is forecast. * Flood stage is 12.2 feet. * Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this evening and continue to rise to near 12.3 feet by Saturday early afternoon. The river will fall below flood stage by Sunday morning. * At 12.2 feet...Minor lowland flooding begins in the vicinity of the gage. && Flood Observed Forecast 6 AM Location Stage Stage Day Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Trinity River Moss Bluff 12.2 12.1 Wed 08 AM 12.2 12.2 12.2 12.2 &&
